coreAttributes.name: energy core
coreAttributes.description: A core with a powerful energy emitted from it.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the cyborg part and look at it longly, analysing what it could be for. [npc.Name] then [npc.verb(put)] it back.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the cyborg part and [npc.verb(show)] it at [npc2.name], wondering what it could be for. [npc.Name] then [npc.verb(put)] it back after seeing that [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(do)] not recognize its usage.
